tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: There was just 5minutes of reasonable waiting period.He explained the cause and cautions evidently. The treatment was satisfactory. I am happy with the overall experience.

*** ***** **** ** *** **** ** *** ** ******** *** **** ****** **** ********* ******* ********* * ******* *** ***** ** ********** *** ******** ****** ** ********** **** ** *** ******** 

Just providing one example out of many experiences during the treatment of my niece, we went to him going by the reviews **** *** **** ***** ******* *** *** ******* **** ** **** ***** after pulpectony he was keep insisting to put a costly cap, with her age of 7 years we asked is this really necessary upon which he kept telling us we are not listening his advice and keep insisting us to go for the cap. We got suspicious and consulted other dentist ** **** *** **** **** ***** ** ** **** ** *** *** **** ****** Since we didn't agree to put a cap he started behaving diffrently.

My advice would be to avoid this clinic you'll definitely regret otherwise.

*** **** ** ******* *** ************** * Went for tooth removal .There was a sinus perforation and fracture of the particular tooth which led to partial removal of the tooth. The remaining broken part of the tooth still embedded inside the gums . The periodontist himself took help from another maxillofacial surgeon Dr. ABHISHEK MAITY to help restore the sinus floor . Thus a painful experience *** ************ ********* ** *** **** ** *** **** *****  *
